title: I'm Still Trying to Cope With My Childhood Molestation - Part 2
description:
In part 2 of Heidi's call, she's not sure she's able to give her father another chance at a relationship and asks Dr. Laura what she should do the next time he asks to see her. - Dr. Laura: "Meet and gather more information so your decision is made from a position of strength."

Could you forgive a parent who betrayed you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
